spec_data.Name: man-pages-ko
spec_data.Description:
Korean translation of the official manpages from LDP and
another useful manpages from various packages. It's done
by the Korean Manpage Project <http://man.kldp.org> which
is maintained by Korean Manpage Project Team.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 05:53:07 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Korean(Hangul) Man(manual) Pages from the Korean Manpage Project
